name: Card Tower Puzzle
description:
This is a small game created for the Mini Jam 71

It's a combination of Tower Defense and Card Game. You use your cards to place the turrets, but you can only place them where they perfectly fit in the jigsaw puzzle path.

Controls:

Click on a card to select it, then click on a place where it fits by the path to place it

Created by:

Zardosh

Franco

Arthur

ZactarZero
